## Installation

You can install the development version of bondy like so:

``` r
if (!require("remotes"))
    install.packages("remotes")

remotes::install_github("selkamand/bondy")
```

## Quick Start


```{r example}
library(bondy)

# Paramaters describe the rotation of each of the input molecules + a couple of general structure paramaters.
pointsymmetry(mol1, mol2)


## Rotate. Compute a few angles. 

# O symmetry
setting_symm
```
